#Comments.@default: Optional, contains default file paths, used when one or more file paths aren't specified in 'GROUP NAME'.
#Comments.GROUP NAME: There can be many groups, but each must have unique name. Also, can contain multiple objects/jobs.
#Comments.pattern_file: File with patterns to be applied.
#Comments.input_file: File that program modifies, overwrites '@default', atleast one in '@default' or 'GROUP NAME' is necessary.
#Comments.output_file: Modified 'input_file', overwrites '@default', atleast one in '@default' or 'GROUP NAME' is necessary.
#Comments.io_path: Optional, path used by 'input_file' and 'output_file' paths, equals '.' (current directory) if not present.
#Comments.pattern_path: Optional, path used by 'pattern_file' paths, equals '.' (current directory) if not present.
